strapiPost.title: Bentonville Remembers Former Football Coach
strapiPost.content:
The Bentonville School district confirmed that Bentonville schools coach and teacher, David Bradley, died after complications with cancer on Saturday, November 14.

  • Info - David Bradley was diagnosed in 2018 with cancer when doctors found a tumor in his brain
  • "David was a special person loved by many," the district said on Twitter. "Our prayers are with Keleigh his parents, siblings and extended family." - 4029 News
